sentences.en: About 70% of women suffer from premenstrual syndrome.
sentences.cn: 大约70％的女性有经前综合征。

sentences.en: AIDS is an acronym for "Acquired Immune Deficiency Syndrome".
sentences.cn: AIDS是“获得性免疫缺损综合症“的首字母缩略词。

sentences.en: AIDS stands for Acquired Immune Deficiency Syndrome.
sentences.cn: AIDS是获得性免疫缺损综合征的缩写。

sentences.en: An autopsy eventually ascribed the baby's death to sudden infant death syndrome.
sentences.cn: 尸检最终认定孩子死于婴儿猝死综合征。

sentences.en: Built-up static contributes to sick building syndrome.
sentences.cn: 高楼林立中的静电干扰是引发大楼病综合征的原因之一。

sentences.en: Cogan's syndrome consists of an interstitial keratitis.
sentences.cn: 柯根化综合症包括间质性角膜炎.

sentences.en: Irritable bowel syndrome seems to affect more women than men.
sentences.cn: 女性比男性更易患肠易激综合征。

sentences.en: Lemon juice can help to prevent economy-class syndrome by improving blood circulation.
sentences.cn: 柠檬汁能够改善血液循环，有助于预防经济舱综合征。

sentences.en: people who suffer from irritable bowel syndrome
sentences.cn: 患有肠道过敏综合征的人

sentences.en: Scientists call this the "it won't affect me" syndrome.
sentences.cn: 科学家把这种现象称为“我无所谓”的典型表现。

sentences.en: The Institute says that an unidentified virus is to blame for the syndrome.
sentences.cn: 该研究所表示,引起这种综合症的是一种尚未确认的病毒.

sentences.en: The lift is about the syndrome.
The spots on his throat are part of a syndrome.
sentences.cn: 他嗓子里的红斑是一种综合征的部分症状.

sentences.en: The syndrome is more likely to strike those whose immune systems are already below par.
sentences.cn: 这种综合征更容易对那些免疫系统已经低于正常水平的人构成威胁。

sentences.en: With the gloomy prospect of returning to work, many people may suffer post-holiday syndrome.
sentences.cn: 一想到又要回到单调的上班生活，许多人都会患上节后综合症。

n. 【医】压挤综合症

唐氏综合征；伸舌样白痴

trans.tran_cn: 综合征，综合症状，典型表现
trans.tran_en: an illness which consists of a set of physical or mental problems – often used in the name of illnesses
